verbs.description: [ARG0: Rob Goldstone] [V: set] up [ARG1: the meeting between Donald Trump Jr and Kremlin asset Natalia Veselnitskaya amongst others in Trump Tower] . In an email between the two , Natalia mentions R. Akhmetshin as a lobbyist who is working with several American Congressmen ....

Rob Goldstone set up the meeting between Donald Trump Jr and Kremlin asset Natalia Veselnitskaya amongst others in Trump Tower . [ARGM-LOC: In an email between the two] , [ARG0: Natalia] [V: mentions] [ARG1: R. Akhmetshin] [ARG2: as a lobbyist who is working with several American Congressmen] ....

Rob Goldstone set up the meeting between Donald Trump Jr and Kremlin asset Natalia Veselnitskaya amongst others in Trump Tower . In an email between the two , Natalia mentions R. Akhmetshin as a lobbyist who [V: is] working with several American Congressmen ....

Rob Goldstone set up the meeting between Donald Trump Jr and Kremlin asset Natalia Veselnitskaya amongst others in Trump Tower . In an email between the two , Natalia mentions R. Akhmetshin as [ARG0: a lobbyist] [R-ARG0: who] is [V: working] [ARG3: with several American Congressmen] ....
